name: Holy Fire
definition: Spits flames which contain the strength of 50kg(?). All attack damage is also multiplied by 1.3 times.

name: Idol Live
definition: Put on a Special Live! Reduce Special cooldown by 30%. Whenever activating the Special, increase all stats by 50% for 10 seconds (can only activate once per 30 seconds).

name: Jingisukan
definition: Throws delicious grilled lamb all around. Standing inside the Jingisukan areas heals 3 HP per second (Considered as Food heal). Also increase Max HP by 100.

name: Snow Queen
definition: Freeze everything around, dealing constant damage. Also increases Crit chance by 20%.

name: True Infinite BL Works
definition: Has a 20% bonus Crit chance. Also increase critical hit damage by 30%.
